result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.addlTxt: Order for payment on November 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
FOR ATTY FEES. DE to pay $50/mo comm 11/15/22. PPF waived. DE will be mailed an Order for Pymt. jaf
From JA to parties re: court appt of Atty Schutte. jaf
Signed by SRN on 10/25/22 appointing Atty Schutte. DE to pay $50/mo comm 11/15/22. jaf
Pre-trial conference on November 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

4:06 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Jeffrey Lee Johnson in court.  Attorney A.W. Schutte in court for Jeffrey Lee Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF31 (PLEAS), 22CF189 (PLEAS), & 22CF714 (STC).  Court reviews file and appoints Atty Schutte on 22CF714.  ADA Smestad states there is no longer a resolution, COMPAS assessment didn't come back as expected, asking to schedule this matter out.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 4:08 PM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

- Maintain mental health treatment

- Prescribed medications only as prescribed

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A.H or Walmart in New Richmond, WI.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:34 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Aaron Damrau in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court. Defendant Jeffrey Lee Johnson in court, in custody. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- PFAC given. DE states Atty Schutte represents in other open matters. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets STC. Court finds good cause to go beyond prelim time limits. Adjourned 01:39 PM
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
